name: Bubble Baby Bounce: Christmas
description: Experience the thrill of this bubble games with multilevel.Clear the missions for every stage along the way.This is a Fun and addictive bubble game.This the best new game.Pick your target carefully, hit the target and blast all the colorful balls.Enjoy the new game as well as new Multicolored bubble.Join the bubble shooter game and overcome all the obstacles on your way to victory.See which bubble color you are going to get next so you can plan your moves ahead.The uniquely challenging obstacles will stop your footsteps.This is a multilevel game and contain beautiful real christmas graphics.
